210.トランプの「大富豪」を 遊ぶことができます。|配られた手札を ルールにしたがって:

|Catch as many fish as you can for a luxurious|reward!

|what kind of requests there are first!

216.依頼者の心が生みだした ダンジョンを 勇者姫アンルシアや|仲間モンスターと共に探:

|you'll also gain more experience, training|stamps, and gold. There's also a chance|you'll be able to get your hands on an even|
|more powerful belt of brilliance!
